currentSkills.name: Wrath
currentSkills.flavor: You are invigorated by your Power Source when your strikes land.
currentSkills.impact: Add 1X damage on Successes and Complete Successes for Muscle actions.
currentSkills.fullText: WRATH PASSIVE GIVEN PALADIN YOU ARE INVIGORATED BY YOUR POWER SOURCE WHEN YOUR STRIKES LAND. ADD 1X DAMAGE ON SUCCESSES AND COMPLETE SUCCESSES FOR MUSCLE ACTIONS.

currentSkills.name: Truth
currentSkills.flavor: Knights specialize in the diverse breadth of all weapons.
currentSkills.impact: For purposes of penalties, no crafted weapon is considered unnatural to the Knight. Improvised Object penalties remain unaffected.
currentSkills.fullText: TRUTH PASSIVE GIVEN KNIGHT KNIGHTS SPECIALIZE IN THE DIVERSE BREADTH OF ALL WEAPONS. FOR PURPOSES OF PENALTIES, NO CRAFTED WEAPON IS CONSIDERED UNNATURAL TO THE KNIGHT. IMPROVISED OBJECT PENALTIES REMAIN UNAFFECTED.

currentSkills.name: Justice
currentSkills.flavor: The weight of consequences should be brought upon those deserving.
currentSkills.impact: An at Range ally is “dying” or “dead”. Deal 2x.
currentSkills.fullText: JUSTICE MUSCLE BASIC KNIGHT 2 THE WEIGHT OF CONSEQUENCES SHOULD BE BROUGHT UPON THOSE DESERVING. AN AT RANGE ALLY IS “DYING” OR “DEAD”. DEAL 2X. DAMAGE

currentSkills.name: Joust
currentSkills.impact: You are mounted. Gain a Success Boost and Deal 2x.
currentSkills.fullText: JOUST MUSCLE ADVANCED KNIGHT 2 YOU ARE MOUNTED. GAIN A SUCCESS BOOST AND DEAL 2X. DAMAGE

currentSkills.name: Anything For You
currentSkills.impact: In their place, the Knight can choose to be the recipient of any incoming damage of an At Close Range creature. This damage cannot be mitigated in any way.
currentSkills.fullText: ANYTHING FOR YOU PASSIVE MASTER KNIGHT IN THEIR PLACE, THE KNIGHT CAN CHOOSE TO BE THE RECIPIENT OF ANY INCOMING DAMAGE OF AN AT CLOSE RANGE CREATURE. THIS DAMAGE CANNOT BE MITIGATED IN ANY WAY.

currentSkills.name: Heavenfall
currentSkills.impact: Your target is a creature at least 10ft tall, or 15ft long/wide. Deal 2X.
currentSkills.fullText: HEAVENFALL MUSCLE BASIC DIVINE 2 YOUR TARGET IS A CREATURE AT LEAST 10FT TALL, OR 15FT LONG/WIDE. DEAL 2X. DAMAGE

currentSkills.name: Prayer of Whispers
currentSkills.flavor: Celestial pathways traverse your mind, sometimes inspiring surreal insight.
currentSkills.impact: Out of Danger, you are using any Evaluate skill. Odds/Evens: Ask an additional question.

plea.name: Whispering Plea
plea.impact: In Danger. The first Action that you take in a fight may be preceded by one free question from the Evaluate list.

currentSkills.name: Prayer of Prophecy
currentSkills.impact: Out of Danger. An ally in sight’s action results in a Critical Setback. Their result instead becomes a Minor Setback.

plea.name: Prophetic Plea
plea.impact: In Danger. Gain the Upper Hand on your next action.
